title: Is my prayer valid if I lose my balance in salah & move from my place #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: she while I was praying and I was in Ru position I lost my balance so my foot came out of my prayer mat and then I went back to the my praying position and went back to the ru on where I was was my prayer valid yes it's valid alhamdulillah and there's no problem in that because it was unintentional and a mistake
